Content: Picking an ambition should lower the potential reward for it. So they
self balance over time (If expanding fleet gives to much points all
palyers will pick it until it gives a fair amount of points). This
could be achived by chaging weights, so every time an ambition is
picked it lowers its weight relative to others (or increases it and the
reward is inverse to the weight), this is necessary since there are
ambitions, that can not be weighted, because they are situation
sensitive, like conuqering a planet or so.
